Source.Name: byobu
Source.Summary: An elegant enhancement of GNU Screen
Source.Description: byobu includes a set of profiles for the GNU Screen window manager which are quite useful on machines running without a graphical desktop environment.

Update.Comment: Version bump; - usr/share/byobu/keybindings/f-keys: make F1 also point to the menu, along with F9; this might help in some tty environments outside of gnome-terminal. - display both ifconfig and ip output in ip_address detail display. - use ip rather than ifconfig to get the ip address, slight performance improvement. - support a flag, IPV6=1, in .byobu/status, to allow for showing IPv6 addresses instead of IPv4.
